metaobject.name: Object
metaobject.is_a: a concept modelled by stateless anonymous types generated by the compiler which allow access to metadata reflecting specific program declarations

operation.name: reflects_same
operation.brief: indicates if two metaobjects reflect the same base-level declaration.

operation.name: get_source_location
operation.brief: returns the source location info of the declaration of $(reflected) reflected by a $(operand).

metaobject.name: ObjectSequence
metaobject.label: Object\nSequence
metaobject.brief: is an ordered sequence of metaobjects.

operation.name: get_size
operation.brief: returns a number of elements in the sequence.

operation.name: get_element
operation.brief: returns the i-th element in a ObjectSequence.

operation.name: get_keyword
operation.brief: returns the keyword of the specifier reflected by a $(operand).

operation.name: get_name
operation.brief: returns the basic name of the $(reflected) reflected by a $(operand).

operation.name: get_type
operation.brief: returns the Type reflecting the type of $(reflected) reflected by a $(operand).

operation.name: get_scope
operation.brief: returns the Scope reflecting the scope of $(reflected) reflected by a $(operand).

operation.name: get_aliased
operation.brief: returns the Named reflecting the original declaration of $(reflected) reflected by a $(operand).

operation.name: is_public
operation.brief: returns whether the $(reflected) reflected by a $(operand) was declared with public access.

metaobject.name: Linkable
metaobject.reflects: declaration with storage duration and/or linkage

operation.name: is_static
operation.brief: returns whether the $(reflected) reflected by a $(operand) was declared with the static specifier.

operation.name: get_reflected_type
operation.brief: returns the the base-level type reflected by a $(operand).

operation.name: get_elaborated_type_specifier
operation.brief: returns a Specifier reflecting the elaborated type specifier (class,struct,union,...) of $(reflected) reflected by a $(operand).

operation.name: get_data_members
operation.brief: returns a sequence of objects reflecting the public data members of $(reflected) reflected by a $(operand).

operation.name: get_all_data_members
operation.brief: returns a sequence of objects reflecting all (including the private and protected) data members of $(reflected) reflected by a $(operand).

operation.name: get_pointer
operation.brief: returns a pointer to the $(reflected) reflected by a $(operand). If the variable is a class member then the pointer is a class data member pointer, otherwise it is a plain pointer.
